typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SalesAmount as double,
		TotalProductCost as double,
		ProductStandardCost as double,
		UnitPriceDiscountPct as boolean,
		ExtendedAmount as double,
		UnitPrice as double,
		OrderQuantity as short,
		SalesTerritoryId as short,
		OrderDate as date,
		ProductId as short,
		SalesOrderLineId as integer,
		Channel as string,
		SalesOrder as string,
		CustomerId as string,
		ResellerId as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	store: 'synapse',
	databaseType: 'spark',
	format: 'table',
	database: 'adworks',
	tableName: 'Sales',
	manifestType: 'manifest') ~> SalesSource
source(output(
		CustomerId as string,
		Customer as string,
		ChannelKey as long,
		GeographyKey as long,
		CustomerKey as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	store: 'synapse',
	databaseType: 'spark',
	format: 'table',
	database: 'adworkstarget',
	tableName: 'DimCustomer',
	manifestType: 'manifest') ~> DimCustomerSource
source(output(
		CustomerId as string,
		Customer as string,
		ChannelKey as long,
		GeographyKey as long,
		CustomerKey as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	store: 'synapse',
	databaseType: 'spark',
	format: 'table',
	database: 'adworkstarget',
	tableName: 'DimCustomer',
	manifestType: 'manifest') ~> DimResellerSource
source(output(
		Channel as string,
		ChannelCategory as string,
		ChannelKey as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100,
	store: 'synapse',
	databaseType: 'spark',
	format: 'table',
	database: 'adworkstarget',
	tableName: 'DimChannel') ~> DimChannelSource
source(output(
		ProductId as short,
		Category as string,
		Subcategory as string,
		Model as string,
		ListPrice as double,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as double,
		Product as string,
		SKU as string,
		ProductKey as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	store: 'synapse',
	databaseType: 'spark',
	format: 'table',
	database: 'adworkstarget',
	tableName: 'DimProduct') ~> DimProductSource
InternetCustomers select(mapColumn(
		CustomerKey,
		CustomerId_lookup = CustomerId
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> DimCustomerSelect
DimResellerSource select(mapColumn(
		ResellerId_lookup = ResellerId,
		ResellerKey
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> DimResellerSelect
DimChannelSource select(mapColumn(
		Channel_lookup = Channel,
		ChannelKey,
		ChannelCategory
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DimChannelSelect
SalesSource, DimChannelSelect lookup(Channel == Channel_lookup,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> ChannelKeyLookup
ChannelKeyLookup, DimCustomerSelect lookup(CustomerId == CustomerId_lookup,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> InternetCustomerKeyLookup
InternetCustomerKeyLookup, DimResellerSelect lookup(ResellerId == ResellerId_lookup,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> ResellerKeyLookup
ProductKeyLookup select(mapColumn(
		SalesAmount,
		TotalProductCost,
		ProductStandardCost,
		UnitPriceDiscountPct,
		ExtendedAmount,
		UnitPrice,
		OrderQuantity,
		OrderDate,
		SalesOrderLineId,
		Channel,
		SalesOrder,
		CustomerId,
		ResellerId,
		ChannelKey,
		CustomerKey,
		ResellerKey,
		ProductKey
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> select1
DimProductSource select(mapColumn(
		ProductId,
		ProductKey
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DimProductSelect
ResellerKeyLookup, DimProductSelect lookup(SalesSource@ProductId == DimProductSelect@ProductId,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> ProductKeyLookup
split1@ResellerCustomers filter(ERROR_FUNCTION('')) ~> InternetCustomers
ChannelType split(ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
	disjoint: false) ~> split1@(ResellerCustomers, InternetCustomers)
DimCustomerSource, DimChannelSelect lookup(ERROR_FUNCTION('') == ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> ChannelType
select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	store: 'synapse',
	databaseType: 'spark',
	format: 'table',
	database: 'adworkstarget',
	tableName: 'FactSales',
	recreate:true,
	manifestType: 'manifest') ~> FactSalesSink
